title: Life on the Mississippi - "language of this water"

content.question: In context, “the language of this water” (first sentence) is best understood to mean the

choices.label: indications of change in the motion of the river
indicators of the fastest channels in the river
movement of fish and fowl along the current

content.answer: indications of change in the motion of the river

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
